welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Southgate, a charming city known for its vibrant culture and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and embrace all that this beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: McNamara Terminal
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The second terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Windsor Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Run Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Willow Run Airport handles shipments for various airlines and freight companies.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Detroit City Airport is a small and modern facility, offering a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Detroit City Airport provides a luxurious and exclusive experience for travelers with private aircraft.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport houses all commercial flights and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport is used for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for military flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
